effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 7.2 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 373 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 93,491 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 140,244.

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
